content.question: In the work shown, Rubens included the mythological figures of Jupiter and Juno to

choices.label: comment satirically on the arrogance of the king and queen
appeal to the civic pride of the Florentine public
represent divine approval of the king and queen’s marriage
subvert the authority of the Roman Catholic Church

content.answer: represent divine approval of the king and queen’s marriage

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.4: Purpose and Audience in Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe contextual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. function.  b. context.  c. siting or physical context.  d. subject matter.  e. reception.
